title: Ended a haram relationship, can I make dua that Allah make him my husband in Jannah? | Assim
transcript: a sister says I had a relationship with a boy now we don't have any relationship we don't communicate with each other I don't want any harm relationship but I want him as my husband in the future so can I pray to Allah all the time to get him as my husband if you have repented felt remorse cut all communications with him and I mean all capital letter bold and underlined not even communicating it with him through SMS or chatting or through Facebook or Twitter Notting if this is the case and you're remorseful there is no problem asking Allah every day to make him your halal husband inshallah
